price: وە لە دروستکردنی خۆتاندا وە لەو گیان لەبەرانەی بڵاودەبنەوە چەند بەڵگە ھەیە بۆ کەسانێك باوەڕی بتەویان ھەبێت
arabic: وَفِي خَلۡقِكُمۡ وَمَا يَبُثُّ مِن دَآبَّةٍ ءَايَٰتٞ لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wafī khalqikum wamā yabuthu min dābbatin āyātun liqawmin yūqinūna
